channel.title: "Error loading your profile. Please contact customer support"
channel.description:
Hey,
I just downloaded a new source to play around with. There's one major problem i don't know how to fix though. Whenever i make an account and login, it works just fine. If i logout and try to log back in it gives me the error; Error loading your profile. Please contact customer support. This happends with every account i make, so it's not just 1 account that isn't working.
Does anyone know how to fix this problem? By the way, i'm really new at coding so please explain step-by-step ^^ I use this source/client: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,663645.0.html
EDIT: Error log: log4j:WARN No appenders could be found for logger (org.apache.mina.filter.executor.ExecutorFilter). log4j:WARN Please initialize the log4j system properly.
Yes, i did try the suggestion made in the source release thread, but it doesn't even let me compile then.. Thanks in advance! Soul

@xx_matty_xx wrote:

Have you tried contacting customer support?

item.title: "Error loading your profile. Please contact customer support"
item.dc:creator: @veraflows veraflows
item.description:
@veraflows wrote:

If you figure this out. Let me know. I’m having the same issue. Its using an SQL database I know that. I set one up but I really never dug too far into it. I’m sure theres a way to run it without.

Read full topic

item.title: "Error loading your profile. Please contact customer support"
item.dc:creator: @Soulxs Soulxs
item.description:
@Soulxs wrote:

Hey,

I just downloaded a new source to play around with. There’s one major problem i don’t know how to fix though.
Whenever i make an account and login, it works just fine. If i logout and try to log back in it gives me the error; Error loading your profile. Please contact customer support.
This happends with every account i make, so it’s not just 1 account that isn’t working.

Does anyone know how to fix this problem? By the way, i’m really new at coding so please explain step-by-step ^^
I use this source/client: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,663645.0.html

EDIT:
Error log:
log4j:WARN No appenders could be found for logger (org.apache.mina.filter.executor.ExecutorFilter).
log4j:WARN Please initialize the log4j system properly.

Yes, i did try the suggestion made in the source release thread, but it doesn’t even let me compile then…
Thanks in advance!
Soul
